editor_palette_item.body:
<g id="list" transform="translate(%%COORDINATE_X%%,%%COORDINATE_Y%%)"> <g> <!-- Metadata information. Please don't edit. --> <text display="none">type=selection</text>
<rect x="5" y="0" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="rgb(200,200,255)" visibility="inherit" width="80" height="0"/> </g> <text visibility="hidden" x="10" y="13" stroke="black" font-size="15" font-family="SunSansSemiBold"> <text display="none">type=hidden_text</text> </text> <g> <!-- Metadata information. Please don't edit. --> <text display="none">type=content</text> </g> <rect x="0" y="-5" rx="5" ry="5" width="90" height="70" fill="none" stroke="rgb(255,165,0)" stroke-width="2" visibility="hidden"> <set attributeName="visibility" attributeType="XML" begin="list.focusin" fill="freeze" to="visible"/> <set attributeName="visibility" attributeType="XML" begin="list.focusout" fill="freeze" to="hidden"/> </rect> <g> <!-- Metadata information. Please don't edit. --> <text display="none">type=bound</text>
<rect x="5.0" y="0.0" width="80" height="60" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/> </g> </g>
